links.description: The Last Samurai was also criticised for casting a White actor as the lead in a story, albeit fictional, about Japanese culture and history. Some critics also argued that the film romanticised the Samurai and ignored their role as oppressors of the lower classes and defenders of a rigid social hierarchy.
